name: HELPNET
description:
Helpnet is an Information Technology management company that operates in Miami since 1997. Our Mission is to Help Businesses considerably increase productivity with automation and process improvement. Whether it is Process Analysis, Process Automation, IT infrastructure Management, Custom Software Development, or support, we provide solutions and expert advice at a fraction of the cost of hiring in-house.
